Br signal at hemozoin crystals and the digestive vacuole mem-
brane indeed originates from BrQ and not from Br found in
Similar observations were made by Dubar et al. (22), who
reported the presence of the quinoline drug, ferroquine, close to
the digestive vacuole membrane of a
blood cell imaged by transmission electron microscopy, and by
Woodland et al. (32), who used visible light fluorescence mi-
croscopy to locate covalently labeled chloroquine at the digestive
vacuole membrane and other parasitic membranes.
BrQ Reaches High Concentrations in the Digestive Vacuole.
